Interface IController<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of object the controller manages
All Known Implementing Classes:
Controller, UserController
public interface IController<T>
Interface for controllers in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system. Provides CRUD operations for a specific type.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    create(Dictionary<String,String> data)
    Creates a new object from the provided data.
    List<T>
    getAll()
    Gets all objects managed by the controller.
    void
    remove(T object)
    Removes the specified object.
    void
    save()
    Saves all managed objects to persistent storage.

      Parameters:

      List<T> getAll()
      Gets all objects managed by the controller.
      Returns:
      A list of all objects

      Removes the specified object.
      Parameters:
